June 11, 2009

incompl

Discounted at a Higher Price

Check out this gem from the AT&T website. Wow.  I get no commitment pricing with a 2-year commitment!  And as a valued customer, I get a discounted upgrade at a higher price. It is like no one even read this to make sure it made sense, or is just doing a terrible job trying to make me feel like their miserable offer is a favor of some kind.
